title: [1.8summon指令]求dalao帮忙改下错误，这个问题急！
txt_content:
[懂指令的dalao帮忙改下]


·我最近在做个海岛生存，指令出错，哪个dalao可以帮我修改一下，感激不尽(づ￣3￣)づ╭?～
·就是个summon指令，在做BOSS的时候出错，指令如下：

/summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {CustomName:"史莱姆射手",CustomNameVisible:1,PersistenceRequired:1b,Equipment:[{id:bow,Count:1,Damage:0,Damage:0S,tag:{AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:+1,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:G},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:3,UUIDMost:3,Amount:+1,AttributeName:generic.knockbackResistance,Name:J},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:4,UUIDMost:4,Amount:+1,AttributeName:generic.movementSpeed,Name:S}],ench:[{id:49,lvl:2},{id:51,lvl:2},{id:50,lvl:2},{id:48,lvl:2}],StoredEnchantments:[{id:49,lvl:2},{id:51,lvl:2},{id:50,lvl:2},{id:48,lvl:2}]}},{},{},{id:minecraft:chainmail_chestplate,Count:1,Damage:0,Damage:0S,tag:{AttributeModifiers:[],ench:[{id:7,lvl:1}],StoredEnchantments:[{id:7,lvl:1}]}},{id:"minecraft:skull",Damage:3,Count:1,tag:{SkullOwner:{Name:"Slime",Id:"9aca565d-105c-4e8c-81fc-740545cb74b2",Properties:{textures:[{Value:"eyJ0ZXh0dXJlcyI6eyJTS0lOIjp7InVybCI6Imh0dHA6Ly90ZXh0dXJlcy5taW5lY3JhZnQubmV0L3RleHR1cmUvMTZhZDIwZmMyZDU3OWJlMjUwZDNkYjY1OWM4MzJkYTJiNDc4YTczYTY5OGI3ZWExMGQxOGM5MTYyZTRkOWI1In19fQ=="}],DropChances:[0f,0f,0f,0f,0f],Attributes:[{Name:generic.knockbackResistance,Base:1},{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:25}]}求答案：

replies.author: free8605
replies.txt_content:
格式错了，少了三四个花括号，1中括号
/summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {CustomName:"史莱姆射手",CustomNameVisible:1,PersistenceRequired:1b,Equipment:[{id:bow,Count:1,Damage:0,Damage:0S,tag:{AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:+1,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:G},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:3,UUIDMost:3,Amount:+1,AttributeName:generic.knockbackResistance,Name:J},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:4,UUIDMost:4,Amount:+1,AttributeName:generic.movementSpeed,Name:S}],ench:[{id:49,lvl:2},{id:51,lvl:2},{id:50,lvl:2},{id:48,lvl:2}],StoredEnchantments:[{id:49,lvl:2},{id:51,lvl:2},{id:50,lvl:2},{id:48,lvl:2}]}},{},{},{id:minecraft:chainmail_chestplate,Count:1,Damage:0,Damage:0S,tag:{AttributeModifiers:[],ench:[{id:7,lvl:1}],StoredEnchantments:[{id:7,lvl:1}]}},{id:"minecraft:skull",Damage:3,Count:1,tag:{Name:"Slime",SkullOwner:{Id:"9aca565d-105c-4e8c-81fc-740545cb74b2",Properties:{textures:[{Value:"eyJ0ZXh0dXJlcyI6eyJTS0lOIjp7InVybCI6Imh0dHA6Ly90ZXh0dXJlcy5taW5lY3JhZnQubmV0L3RleHR1cmUvMTZhZDIwZmMyZDU3OWJlMjUwZDNkYjY1OWM4MzJkYTJiNDc4YTczYTY5OGI3ZWExMGQxOGM5MTYyZTRkOWI1In19fQ=="}]}}}},DropChances:[0f,0f,0f,0f,0f]],Attributes:[{Name:generic.knockbackResistance,Base:1},{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:25}]}复制代码

replies.author: Kyokuki
replies.txt_content: 你484用了彩字的，把彩字那段删掉

残雪、 发表于 2017-6-1 13:57
你484用了彩字的，把彩字那段删掉
彩字？你是指乱码？

free8605 发表于 2017-6-1 14:40
格式错了，少了三四个花括号，1中括号
谢谢dalao，真的帮了我大忙！(づ￣3￣)づ

replies.author: Kyokuki
replies.txt_content:
2330848276 发表于 2017-6-1 14:25
彩字？你是指乱码？
如果不是我建议你重新做一下这个命令
或者你给我提供要求我给你编写命令
因为我确实没看出什么问题

残雪、 发表于 2017-6-1 14:29
如果不是我建议你重新做一下这个命令
或者你给我提供要求我给你编写命令
因为我确实没看出什么问题 ...
哦，那我给你提供要求，弄一个骷髅小白，速度1，生命25，能抵抗击退，手拿一把弓，击退2，力量2，名字叫史莱姆射手，头上戴一个史莱姆的头[具体头颅在http://mc.ahgame.com/pic/toulu/20161024173037.shtml]，身上穿一个丝袜衣服，带有保护1的，物品不掉，永久存在

replies.author: free8605
replies.txt_content:
2330848276 发表于 2017-6-1 14:27
谢谢dalao，真的帮了我大忙！(づ￣3￣)づ
我是咸鱼……
给你答案的怪物头的tag我改了下，把Name:"Slime"给放前面去了，其实不用改，纯净是少了4个} 和1个]
另外，弓上的“StoredEnchantments”好像没用，这是附魔书上的属性

free8605 发表于 2017-6-1 14:50
我是咸鱼……
给你答案的怪物头的tag我改了下，把Name:"Slime"给放前面去了，其实不用改，纯净是少了4个} ...
我就是不会格式，这些括号什么的
